original_title: The Vizconde Massacre: God, Help Us!
overview: Based on the infamous and seemingly never ending 1991 Vizconde murder case in the Philippines where a woman and her two children; a teen daughter who was also raped and a 6-year-old, were all viciously stabbed to death while the husband was away in America on business. Includes gruesome real photos from the crime scene. A second movie, The Untold Story: Vizconde Massacre II, was released in 1994.
tagline: They kept on screaming, but there was no answer... and the only way out was to die!
title: The Vizconde Massacre: God, Help Us!
